<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=536&user=10620> 	

Did you know? People who set specific and challenging goals perform 90% better than those with vague or easy goals.


Set clear goals and upload your 2025 Goals in DRIVE by 31st March. Visit the Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=536&user=10620>  for FAQs, goal-setting guidance, and resources to help you set goals in DRIVE and align them with the Group’s objectives.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	
Welcoming Arnaud Tesoriere 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=537&user=10620> 	
Arnaud Tesoriere joins our Group as Senior Manager- Information Security (GRC) reporting to Dee Deu. In his new role, Arnaud will focus on reinforcing the GRC practice and support the security strategy by implementing the most adapted frameworks to mitigate the risks to our organization and support our business in the most efficient way.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-5-min.png> 	

Tanagra Suhoor At Bab al Shams

chunks.text:
Tanagra Suhoor At Bab al Shams

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=538&user=10620> 	
Tanagra hosted an intimate Suhoor, celebrating the holy month of Ramadan and the exclusive creations designed for the occasion, alongside key pieces that resonate with the season. Set in the same location as the Voyage of Light campaign shoot, the evening paid tribute to its theme tracing the journey of transformation from sand to crystal.
Guests experienced a series of thoughtful activations, from a sand artist bringing the narrative to life to a henna artist weaving campaign-inspired designs. A dedicated gaming corner offered a relaxed setting where guests enjoyed tea and coffee in Silsal’s elegant tableware, accompanied by Tanagra-branded games, making for a meaningful and immersive gathering.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

Mastering Skincare BY Dr. Raquel Fernandez

The Retail Academy recently hosted an exclusive Skincare Masterclass with Dr. Raquel Fernandez de Castro, Doctor of Aesthetic Medicine. With 25 engaged attendees, the session offered expert insights on active ingredients, aesthetic procedures, and skin health—keeping our teams at the forefront of beauty education.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/56fa2e5769dfbe431c0b78600d50add1237022048.jpeg> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

versace x Emirates Airlines
